title: Thoughts on Brand?
body: I just wanted to hear people their thoughts on Brand, I personally think that he's too strong (even more so with the updated liandry's). So I got curious what other people thought of Brand

replies.body:
{{item:3151}} was nerfed pretty hard for him, it does less damage, no longer gives flat pen, and the damage stacks wont do much for brand, since typically only his DoTs are doing damage past 2-4 seconds.

Early ludens is actually pretty nice on him from what i have seen.
He’s strong with damage but if he misses q he is very unsafe. I think he’s fine. You just have to respect his w damage.
